## Installation

You can install regsim from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("altaf-ali/regsim")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(regsim)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
data(mtcars)
```

```{r}
model <- lm(mpg ~ wt + cyl, data = mtcars)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
set.seed(666)
```

```{r}
x <- list(
  wt = seq(1, 5, 0.1),
  cyl = mean(mtcars$cyl)
)

sim <- regsim(model, x)
```

```{r plot}
plot(sim, ~ wt)
```

```{r}
summary(sim)
```
